introductions: Oh, honey!  I'm so sorry you have to look into this case. | Let me know if I can get you anything to eat to help the case. | Not for free, of course.  Kindness doesn't pay for itself.
openers: Welcome back, honey!  What can I get you?
You look starved, honey.  You shouldn't work so hard.
Honey, take a break.  You seem like you need it.
closers: It seems like you've been working for awhile.  Maybe you should take a bread break.
Oh, my husband would've liked you.
